plot: Leona Ozaki joins Newport City's infamous Tank Police division. With aid of Al and her newly built mini-tank, Bonaparte, she wages war on Buaku and his cohorts, the Puma Sisters.
opening_theme: "Cherry Moon de Odorasete" (チェリームーンで踊らせて) by Shōjo-Tai
ending_theme: "Hoshi no Orgel" (星のオルゴール) by Shōjo-Tai
insert_song: "Kowareta Labyrinth" (壊れたラビリンス) by Reiko Yasuhara (ep 2)
"Tanky Boys! Tanky Girls!" by Riko Eshima (ep 1)
